mapper.sql: id, name, opera_info, state, create_time, modify_time, deleted, version
mapper.insert: insert into opera (name, opera_info, state, create_time, modify_time, deleted, version) values (#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operaInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deleted,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into opera
name,
opera_info,
state,
create_time,
modify_time,
deleted,
version,

mapper.update:
update opera
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
opera_info = #{operaInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
state = #{state,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
